inlineContent.text: The more I learn the less I feel I know and therefore the less that I feel like I can give back to anyone else. I’ve been an entrepreneur for the last 18 or so months and while thinking about it earlier today I struggled to come up with lessons I could share with someone else wanting to do the same thing. I have to ask myself what insight I can provide when I feel like I haven’t proven myself and even if I have then I know there’s no guarantee that what I did will work for you. At this point I can’t confidently share any business fundamentals that are critical to success.
What I can share is what I’ve experienced without the insight. Maybe that’s enough.

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
